query.name: List: Critical Indicators by Sales Rep and Time

dmMemberProperty.MPUN: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Period].[Reporting Fiscal Period Id]

dmLevel.LUN: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Period]

dmMember.MUN: [BSD Sales].[BSD Sales].[Net Sales - w/o Tech Depot]

dataItemCalculatedMeasure.name: Ecom % of Total
dataItemCalculatedMeasure.expression: [E-commerce - Net Sales]/[Net Sales - w/o Tech Depot]

dataItemCalculatedMeasure.name: Furniture % of Total
dataItemCalculatedMeasure.expression: [Furniture - Net Sales]/[Net Sales - w/o Tech Depot]

dataItemCalculatedMeasure.name: Private Brand % of Total
dataItemCalculatedMeasure.expression: [Private Brand - Net Sales]/[Net Sales - w/o Tech Depot]

dataItemCalculatedMeasure.name: CBS % of Total
dataItemCalculatedMeasure.expression: [CBS - Net Sales]/[Net Sales - w/o Tech Depot]

dataItemCalculatedMeasure.name: DPS % of Total
dataItemCalculatedMeasure.expression: [DPS - Net Sales]/[Net Sales - w/o Tech Depot]

detailFilter.filterExpression: [BSD Sales].[Customer].[Customer].[Customer Account Level 3].[Customer Account Level 3 Id] in (?p_customer_Grandparent?)
[BSD Sales].[Customer].[Customer].[Customer Account Level 2].[Customer Account Level 2 Id] in (?p_customer_parent?)
[BSD Sales].[Customer].[Customer].[Customer Account Level 1].[Customer Account Id] in (?p_customer?)
[BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Year].[Reporting Fiscal Year Id] IN ( ?ReportingFiscalYearId? )
[BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Quarter].[Reporting Fiscal Quarter Id] IN ( ?ReportingFiscalQuarterId? )
[BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Period].[Reporting Fiscal Period Id] IN ( ?ReportingFiscalPeriodId? )
[BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Week].[Reporting Fiscal Week Id] IN ( ?ReportingFiscalWeekId? )
[BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Day].[Reporting Fiscal Date] IN_RANGE ?ReportingFiscalDate?

dataItem.name: Reporting Fiscal Year Id
dataItem.expression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Year].[Reporting Fiscal Year Id]

dataItem.name: Reporting Fiscal Year
dataItem.expression: trim( [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Year].[Reporting Fiscal Year] )

detailFilter.filterExpression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Day].[Reporting Fiscal Date] BETWEEN {date} - 1092 AND {date}

dataItem.name: Reporting Fiscal Quarter Id
dataItem.expression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Quarter].[Reporting Fiscal Quarter Id]

dataItem.name: Reporting Fiscal Quarter
dataItem.expression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Quarter].[Reporting Fiscal Quarter]

detailFilter.filterExpression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Day].[Reporting Fiscal Date] BETWEEN {date} - 1092 AND {date}

dataItem.name: Reporting Fiscal Period Id
dataItem.expression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Period].[Reporting Fiscal Period Id]

dataItem.name: Reporting Fiscal Period
dataItem.expression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Period].[Reporting Fiscal Period]

detailFilter.filterExpression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Day].[Reporting Fiscal Date] BETWEEN {date} - 1092 AND {date}

dataItem.name: Reporting Fiscal Week Id
dataItem.expression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Week].[Reporting Fiscal Week Id]

dataItem.name: Reporting Fiscal Week
dataItem.expression: trim( [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Week].[Reporting Fiscal Week] )

detailFilter.filterExpression: [BSD Sales].[Reporting Time].[Reporting Fiscal Time].[Reporting Fiscal Day].[Reporting Fiscal Date] BETWEEN {date} - 1092 AND {date}

list.name: List11
list.refQuery: List: Critical Indicators by Sales Rep and Time

list.name: List112
list.refQuery: List: Critical Indicators by Sales Rep and Time

list.name: List111
list.refQuery: List: Critical Indicators by Sales Rep and Time

dataSource.staticValue: This option allows you to filter the report by selecting from possible fiscal years or quarters or periods or weeks.
This option allows you to filter the report by selecting start and end dates (also known as a date range).
This option allows you to filter the report by selecting from possible levels in the customer hierarchy.
You must select at least one Reporting Fiscal Year to filter this report.
You must select at least one Reporting Fiscal Quarter to filter this report.
You must select at least one Reporting Fiscal Period to filter this report.
You must select at least one Reporting Fiscal Week to filter this report.
You must select a start and an end date to filter this report.
You may select one or more Customer's for this report ?
You may select one or more Customer Parent's for this report ?
You may select one or more Customer Grandparent's for this report ?
Enter Sku numbers manually or paste values from Excel into prompt.

reportVariable.name: Display Customer Output?
reportVariable.reportExpression: IF ( ParamValue('output_view') = 'default' ) THEN ( ParamValue('p_customer_h') ) ELSE ( ParamValue('output_view') )
